abilities.name: Intimidating Fang
abilities.effect: As long as Arbok is your Active Pokémon, any damage to your Pokémon done by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Toxic
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokémon between turns.
